Constructor Detail

DelimitedFileReader

public DelimitedFileReader(File file)
                    throws IOException
Convenience constructor loading all columns with default cell readers. Calls DelimitedFileReader(File, String[]) with columnsToRead = null.

Parameters:
file - file to read
Throws:
IOException - if problem opening file or if a column specified does not exist.

DelimitedFileReader

public DelimitedFileReader(File file,
                           String[] columnsToRead)
                    throws IOException
Convenience constructor loading specified columns with default cell readers. Calls DelimitedFileReader(File, String[], CellReader[], DelimiterSettings) with cellReaders = null and settings = null.

Parameters:
file - file to read
columnsToRead - if null, all columns are read. If specified, then only these columns will be read.
Throws:
IOException - if problem opening file or if a column specified does not exist.

DelimitedFileReader

public DelimitedFileReader(File file,
                           String[] columnsToRead,
                           CellReader<?>[] cellReaders,
                           DelimiterSettings settings)
                    throws IOException
Construct DelimitedFileReader.

Parameters:
file - file
columnsToRead - if null, all columns are read. If specified, then only these columns will be read.
cellReaders - cell readers. If null then the default Column cell reader is used for all columns.
settings - delimiter settings. If null will use default ( DelimiterSettings.WINDOWS_CSV).
Throws:
IOException - if problem loading file

createCellProcessors

public static CellProcessor[] createCellProcessors(String[] header,
                                                   Map<String,Column> mappedColumns)
Create a CellProcessor array from the file columns. The array must be the same size of the header array, so columns that are not being read will have a null in that location in the returned array.

Parameters:
header - array of column names in the file
mappedColumns - map of columns in the file to process
Returns:
an array of CellProcessors that will parse each column, or null if columns is null.
